projects.name: Voice Assistant
projects.description: This Python-based voice assistant handles tasks like opening websites, sending emails, playing music, fetching news and weather, and interacting with OpenAI for AI responses. It uses speech_recognition for commands and pyttsx3 for responses. The project supports system controls, WhatsApp messaging, and is easily customizable for additional features.

projects.name: Snake Game
projects.description: This Python Snake game, built with pygame, challenges players to control a snake, collect food, and grow without hitting the screen boundaries. It features score tracking, a restart option, and simple controls via arrow keys. The game window is 600x400 pixels, with customizable colors and speed.

projects.name: Banking System
projects.description: This C language based banking system allows users to create accounts, deposit, withdraw, and check their balance.The system also includes a simple command-line interface for user interaction.

projects.name: Library Management system using Python
projects.description: This Python-based library management system allows users to add, remove, and lend books. It uses SQLite for database storage and Tkinter for GUI design. The system also includes a simple command-line interface for user interaction.

projects.name: Portfolio-website using Flask
projects.description: A dynamic portfolio website built with Python and Flask, showcasing skills, projects, and contact information.
